thread.title: Manhattan Bridge Capital, Inc. Announces Payment of Quarterly $0.08 Per Share Dividend
thread.title_full: Manhattan Bridge Capital, Inc. Announces Payment of Quarterly $0.08 Per Share Dividend

title: Manhattan Bridge Capital, Inc. Announces Payment of Quarterly $0.08 Per Share Dividend
text: Manhattan Bridge Capital, Inc. Announces Payment of Quarterly $0.08 Per Share Dividend July 06, 2015 07:00 ET | Source: Manhattan Bridge Capital, Inc. LONG ISLAND, N.Y., July 06, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Manhattan Bridge Capital, Inc. (NASDAQ: LOAN ) announced today that in accordance with the board approved dividend declared May 5, 2015, a cash dividend of $0.08 per share will be paid to all shareholders of record on July 10, 2015 with pay date on July 15, 2015. Contact: Assaf Ran, CEO (516) 444-3400 Related Articles
